description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Windows Media Player osksupport.dll (UACMe 32) Author: Christian Burkard. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: UAC Bypass Using Windows Media Player - File
query: ((file.path:C\:\\Users\\* AND file.path:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\OskSupport.dll) OR (process.executable:"C\:\\Windows\\system32\\DllHost.exe" AND file.path:"C\:\\Program\ Files\\Windows\ Media\ Player\\osk.exe"))
